original_title: Dead Wrong: How Psychiatric Drugs Can Kill Your Child
overview: This is a real-life story about a Mother who lost her son to the dangers of psychotropic drugs that were prescribed to him by a general physician. In her quest to find the answers to what she could've done differently, she discovers the truth about psychiatric drugs. She then decides to do something about it.
tagline: his is a real-life story about a Mother who lost her son to the dangers of psychotropic drugs that were prescribed to him by a general physician.
title: Dead Wrong: How Psychiatric Drugs Can Kill Your Child
